It is unclear to me from the documentation if the inputstream returned by R=
ecorder.getReplayInputStream() is supposedly encoded according to Recorder.=
getCharset() or according to Recorder.getContentEncoding(). Can somebody an=
swer this question for me?

Also is there some documentation where these va=
lues are coming from (http-headers, in-document declarations, etc.) and how=
 conflicting values are handled?

Thanks!
